jade.fov
Interface FoV

All Known Implementing Classes:
Raycast, Shadowcast
public interface FoV

This interface represents field of vision calculation on a jade World.

Nested Class Summary
static class FoV.FoVFactory
          Used for retrieving varius singleton instances of FoV implementing classes.
 
Method Summary
 java.util.Collection<Coord> calcFoV(World world, int x, int y, int range)
          Calculates field of vision from a given tile on world.
 

Method Detail

calcFoV

java.util.Collection<Coord> calcFoV(World world,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int range)
Calculates field of vision from a given tile on world. The passable method is used to determine if light can continue through a square. The field of vision is limited by the range.

Parameters:
world - the world on which the field will be calculated
x - the x-coordinate of the origion of the field of vision
y - the y-coordinate of the origion of the field of vision
range - the maximum range for the field of vision
Returns:
a Collection of tiles in the field of vision
